blurb.en: The mesh sides will help keep you cool, and the adjustable strap means you can get a perfect fit every time.

children.text: Looking for a classic trucker hat that will never go out of style? Look no further than the Black Trucking mesh Hat. This hat is perfect for those hot summer days when you need to keep the sun out of your eyes. The mesh sides will help keep you cool, and the adjustable strap means you can get a perfect fit every time.
